director.name: 布莱恩·麦克德莫特 Brian McDermott

this_title: A Fandemic: 50 Fans Celebrate 50 Years of Cinema
introduction: With so many creative people stuck at home during this horrible time, we wanted to give people a creative outlet. Besides being actors/writers/producers/directions/etc, we are movie fans. We had people from around the world recreate scenes from their favorite movies using only what they had access to during this 2021 quarantine. The creativity was nothing short of magical.
chinese_title: A Fandemic: 50 Fans Celebrate 50 Years of Cinema
